extensionDescription.message: Searches the selected text using a search engine or AI prompt from your custom list of search engines and AI prompts managed in the extension's preferences page.

multisearch.message: is a search with multiple search engines simultaneously.
multisearch.description: multi-search - it's a search with multiple search engines simultaneously.

multisearchHowTo.message: Check the middle checkbox to include a search engine in a

multisearchEnd.message: from the context menu or from the address bar by typing:

active.message: Make the new tab or window active

position.message: Display the search results after the last tab

header3.message: Position of options in the context menu

subheader31.message: Where would you like the options menu item to appear in the context menu?

import.message: Import search engines (in JSON format) from local disk

export.message: Export options, search engines and the prompts library to a JSON file

note.message: This feature requires Firefox 56 or above.

exactMatch.message: Search for an exact string match

disableDoubleClick.message: Disable double click for adding search engines that use HTTP POST requests

gridMode.message: Display a grid of icons instead of a list of search engines

warning.message: Warning: Please note that enabling this feature will prevent context menus from other extensions to be displayed.

header6.message: Which search engines would you like to see appear in the context menu or grid of icons?

showSearchEngine.message: Show search engine in the context menu or grid of icons

keyboardShortcutWarning.message: not all key combinations will work. Avoid using keyboard shortcuts that start with CMD on macOS or CTRL on Windows or Linux, as these are usually reserved for Firefox commands.

multipleSearchEnginesSearch.message: Include this search engine in a multi-search

notifyEnableStorageSync.message: Please ensure that the flag 'webextensions.storage.sync.enabled' is set to 'true' in 'about:config', otherwise Context Search won't work.

notifySearchEnginesLoaded.message: Default list of search engines has been loaded.

notifySearchEngineNotFound.message: A search engine couldn't be found on the current web page

omniboxDescription.message: Search using Context Search with keywords. Usage: cs [keyword] [search terms] (e.g. 'cs w Linux' searches Wikipedia for the term 'Linux')

notifyUsage.message: Usage: cs [keyword] [search terms] (for example: cs w Linux)

notifySearchEngineUrlRequired.message: Please fill in a valid search engine URL.

displayFavicons.message: Display icons in the context menu

forceSearchEnginesReload.message: Force reload of default search engines list

restriction.message: If the sidebar isn't already open, then you may have to click on the 'Show sidebars' icon from the browser toolbar.

reverseImage.message: Also, reverse image search results cannot be displayed in the sidebar.

siteSearch.message: Search engine for searching current site:

useRegex.message: Use regular expressions to build the context menu

regexNote.message: This feature doesn't apply to the grid of icons.

multiAfterLastTab.message: After the last tab in the current window

multiActiveTab.message: Right after the active tab in the current window

enableDownloadsReminder.message: enable Downloads permissions to export your search engines.

quickIconGrid.message: Immediately display the grid of icons after text has been selected

closeGridOnMouseOut.message: Close the grid of icons on mouse out

xOffset.message: Horizontal offset of the grid of icons:

yOffset.message: Vertical offset of the grid of icons:

promptShow.message: Show AI prompt in the context menu or grid of icons

overwriteSearchEngines.message: Overwrite the existing search engines with the imported search engines

removeFolderConfirmPrefix.message: Are you sure that you want to remove the folder

removeSearchEngineConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove the search engine

popupBlockedMessage.message: Popup blocked! Please allow popups for this site.

startSubscription.message: Start a new monthly, yearly or lifetime subscription

notifyMissingSearchEngine.message: No search engines have been selected for a multi-search

notifyMissingBookmarkUrl.message: Could not retrieve URL for bookmark removal

notifyAIMinimalRequirements.message: Please at least select an AI service provider and input an AI prompt name and an AI prompt

titleSearchEngines.description: Title of search engines tab in the Options page

templateVarsIntro.message: Use these placeholders in GET URLs, POST form data, AI prompts, and bookmarklets.

templateVarsNotes.message: {referrer} may be empty depending on Referrer-Policy; {selection_html} can be long; sanitize if you display it.

promptLockedEnterPassword.message: This prompt is locked. Enter password to insert it:
